data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bosmans, Van Keer (2012): On the spider species described by L. Koch in 1882 from the Balearic Islands (Araneae). Arachnologische Mitteilungen 43 (1): 5-16, DOI: 10.5431/aramit4306, URL: http://www.academia.edu/18752668/On_the_spider_species_described_by_L._Koch_in_1882_from_the_Balearic_Islands_Araneae_|37 occurrences
